name: War Modern Combat
description:
War Modern Combat is an action-packed shooting war game. It is not just a gun shooting game, but a whole new dimension into the world of war and glory. This game will take an exhilarating turn in every step you will make.
Features:

-Gun game for free
-Easy controls
-Anti-terrorist FPS experience
-20 objectives based levels
-Limited combat time
-Realistic 3D military base camp area
